info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 1:47PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Berkshire County through 215 PM EDT... At 146 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sheffield, or 7 miles southeast of Great Barrington, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... Sheffield, Otis, Sandisfield, New Marlborough, Monterey, Tyringham, Sodom, East Sheffield, Hartsville, Konkapot, Gomorrah, New Boston, North Otis, Montville, Southfield, East Otis, Cold Spring, South Sandisfield, Otis Wood Lanes and Algerie Four Corners. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
